DOC.brief_summary: During IVF cycle embryo generally place uterine cavity 3 5 day fertilization . For successful pregnancy take place , embryo must implant properly prim staged endometrium , subsequently must continue develop accommodate grow mature embryo fetus . This process normally regulate hormonal interaction fetal , endometrial luteal tissue . It find IVF additional support endometrium progesterone improve implantation subsequent live birth rate IVF cycle . Recent data show additional supplementation single administration GnRH agonist around time time embryo transfer may enhance rate .
